categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: A female Sith serving in the reconstituted Sith Empire, this individual rose to become a Sith Overseer in the Sith Academy on Korriban; a position used not only to instruct the Acolytes in the ways of the Sith, but also to ensure that only the most powerful students pass the trials. However, she wasn't popular among her students, one of which, Veeroa Denz, thought her to be cruel. When the Eternal Empire invaded Korriban in 3636 BBY and stormed the Sith Academy, Veeroa decapitated the overseer, using her opportunity to flee the Academy for good, becoming a fugitive.
